response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product boasts unparalleled features and capabilities that set it apart from its competitors, making it an invaluable asset for any business looking to gain a competitive edge. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to the market value. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing of the product.", "product_price": 850000}
